name: Armenian Style Lentil Soup

recipeInstructions.text: Boil lentils in water for 15 minutes.
Add onion, parsley, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 45 minutes.
Add mint and butter. Simmer for 15 minutes.
Add 1/4 tsp. pepper and cook for 5 minutes.
Optional: Fry butter until light brown and pour over soup.

keywords: lentil soup, Armenian recipe, mint soup
